message: Part of the sea wall has collapsed near the Gateway of India. Water is rushing in. We need immediate evacuation from the waterfront shops! #MumbaiDeluge
My grandfather is having a heart attack at our home in Colaba Causeway. We can't get out due to flooding. Need an ambulance urgently. Apartment 4B, Causeway House.
We are a group of 50 people stranded on the upper floor of Phoenix Marketcity mall in Kurla. Power is out, but we are safe for now. Need food and water supplies.
KEM Hospital in Parel is running out of oxygen cylinders and blood bags. We have over 20 critical patients. Need immediate medical resupply.
The main road into Dharavi is blocked by a landslide. No vehicles can get in or out. Requesting heavy machinery to clear the debris.
Our family of 4 needs food. We are in our flat near Powai Lake and have run out of everything. Not life-threatening yet, but we need help.
Are there any government shelters open near Juhu Beach? We need to evacuate our home but don't know where to go.
Landline is down at Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CSMT). Can't contact railway authorities. This is a major communication failure.
HELP!!! MUMBAI IS SINKING!!! WE ARE ALL DOOMED!!!! #MumbaiFloods #SOS
Free rescue boats for all Mumbai citizens! Click here to register your location and get help fast: tiny.url/fake-rescue-link
My basement is flooded. What should I do?
Electrical pole has fallen and wires are exposed near the entrance of Sanjay Gandhi National Park, Borivali. Very dangerous, sparking in the rain.
